import sys
import io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
sys.path.insert\(0, ''C:/coding/netcom/backend''\)

from services.podcast_scraper_factory import PodcastScraperFactory

# 获取 fm139 爬虫实例
scraper = PodcastScraperFactory.get_scraper\(''fm139''\)

print\(''=== 测试获取单集详情（含解密的音频URL）===''\)
detail = scraper.get_episode_detail\(''3506_1''\)
if detail:
    print\(f''标题: {detail[""title""]}''\)
    print\(f''音频URL: {detail[""audioUrl""]}''\)
    print\(f''备用URL: {detail[""audioUrlBackup""]}''\)
    print\(f''封面: {detail[""cover""][:60]}...'' if len\(detail[""cover""]\) > 60 else f''封面: {detail[""cover""]}''\)
else:
    print\(''获取失败''\)
")
